text: Meri Teri Uski Baat () is a novel written by Yashpal. This novel is based on the history of Indian independence movement. This novel won the Hindi-language Sahitya Akademi Award in 1976. ==References== Category:1974 novels Category:20th-century Indian novels Category:Books about politics of India Category:Hindi-language novels Category:Rajkamal Prakashan books Category:Sahitya Akademi Award-winning works Category:1974 Indian novels
title: Meri Teri Uski Baat
